titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013
A bill to adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/13/2013--Introduced. Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013 - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary.
